item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

6. They don't make them like that any more: the Yamaha DX7 keyboard (183 points | 109 comments)
7. Bitcoin price hits $100K for first time in history (43 points | 22 comments)

13. The story of Rogue (209 points | 82 comments)
14. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (1021 points | 426 comments)
15. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (331 points | 1502 comments)

26. The Hoare Cube (68 points | 14 comments)
27. AI hallucinations: Why LLMs make things up (and how to fix it) (130 points | 133 comments)

29. Interview with Dr. Ken Iverson (1982) (60 points | 13 comments)
30. History of rat control in Alberta (81 points | 69 comments)
